${ModID}:HuntingStrike.NAME: Hunting Strike
${ModID}:HuntingStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals double damage to elites and bosses.

${ModID}:Focus.NAME: Track
${ModID}:Focus.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted

${ModID}:PerfectDodge.NAME: Perfect Dodge
${ModID}:PerfectDodge.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If your Block is broken exactly this turn, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Greatsword.NAME: Greatsword
${ModID}:Greatsword.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If you have unspent energy at the end of the turn, increase this card's damage by 8 for each until played.

${ModID}:HuntingInstincts.NAME: Hunter's Instincts
${ModID}:HuntingInstincts.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Gains double Block if facing an elite or boss.

${ModID}:SkullClub.NAME: Skull Club
${ModID}:SkullClub.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If the target survives, become ${ModID}:Enraged! NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CoreBlaster.NAME: Core Blaster
${ModID}:CoreBlaster.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a *Core *Blinder to your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:CoreBlaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a *Core *Blinder+ to your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CoreBlinder.NAME: Core Blinder
${ModID}:CoreBlinder.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Add a *Core *Blaster to your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:CoreBlinder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Add a *Core *Blaster+ to your 抽牌堆. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:GuardianShield.NAME: Guardian Shield
${ModID}:GuardianShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block at the end of your turn. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.NAME: Inferno Daggers
${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times and set this card's cost to 6. NL When Retained, reduce this card's cost by 1.
${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times and set this card's cost to 6. NL When Retained, reduce this card's cost by 1.

${ModID}:StabManual.NAME: Stabbing Manual
${ModID}:StabManual.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Add !M! *Shivs to your hand. Increase the number of *Shivs this adds by 1 for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:SlimeHammer.NAME: Slime Hammer
${ModID}:SlimeHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage at the end of the next turn.
${ModID}:SlimeHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Deal !D! damage at the end of the next turn.

${ModID}:SlaverWhip.NAME: Slaver's Whip
${ModID}:SlaverWhip.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL If this kills an enemy, add it back to your hand and it costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:GremlinLance.NAME: Gremlin Lance
${ModID}:GremlinLance.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this kills an enemy, gain [E] and 抽一张牌.

${ModID}:ChampMail.NAME: Champion's Platemail
${ModID}:ChampMail.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you are at 50% Health or below, remove all your debuffs and gain !M! Strength. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:ChampMail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you are at 50% Health or below, remove all your debuffs and gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:CursedBow.NAME: Cursed Bow
${ModID}:CursedBow.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HyperBlaster.NAME: Hyper Blaster
${ModID}:HyperBlaster.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle !M! Voids into your 抽牌堆.

${ModID}:StoneHelm.NAME: Stone Helm
${ModID}:StoneHelm.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 Reduced by 2 for every card you've played this turn. NL End your turn.

${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.NAME: Timepiece Tiara
${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength every 12 cards you play.
${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 3 Strength every 12 cards you play.

${ModID}:CarvingKnife.NAME: Carving Knife
${ModID}:CarvingKnife.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If this kills an Elite or Boss enemy, gain its weapon or armor card. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:AwakenedRitualDagger.NAME: Awakened Dagger
${ModID}:AwakenedRitualDagger.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If Fatal, Heal to full HP. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HuntingContract.NAME: Hunting Contract
${ModID}:HuntingContract.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HunterRank.NAME: Hunter Rank
${ModID}:HunterRank.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Increases by 1 for each Elite and Boss enemy you've defeated. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:TranqBomb.NAME: Tranquilizer Bomb
${ModID}:TranqBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Nonlethal damage. NL Target enemy loses !M! Strength. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Paintball.NAME: Paintball
${ModID}:Paintball.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL Retain !${ModID}:m2! card this turn.
${ModID}:Paintball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL Retain !${ModID}:m2! cards this turn.
